name: AS_GCM_UT_filterRefDataForSelection
description: Filters a list of reference data for only active values (includes the current value if the current value is inactive), to be used for selection in field such as a dropdown
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRefDataForSelection(
  data: ri!refData,
  currentValue: ri!currentValue.refDataId,
  valueField: "refDataId",
  additionalFilterField: "refType",
  additionalFilterValue: ri!refType,
  labelField: "refLabel",
  skipInactiveAppend: ri!skipInactiveAppend
)
